bl.postprocessor
Class Scoring

java.lang.Object
  bl.postprocessor.Scoring

public class Scoring
extends java.lang.Object

Produces the scoring out of an ARFF, which is passed to EntropyRanker. Documentation on different scores see Eichinger et al.

Author:
Christopher Oßner

Nested Class Summary
static class Scoring.Result
           Attributes of results provided by EntropyRanker.getSelectedAttributes() hold just an attribute String.
static class Scoring.Score
           Represents the final score.
static class Scoring.ScoreComperator
           Used as indicator, which field of Scoring.Score is ordered, if Scores are retrieved by getRanking()

arff - where to store the ARFF (for WEKA)
reincludeDummies - if dummies are omitted before, they can be re-included by passing true

parseResults

private java.util.ArrayList<Scoring.Result> parseResults(EntropyRanker.Result[] input)
Converts input to more convenient result representation. Only scores greater than 0 are considered.

Parameters:
input - information gain results as produced by EntropyRanker.getSelectedAttributes()
Returns:
converted input in same order

unifyVertices

private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> unifyVertices(java.util.ArrayList<Scoring.Result> results)

Returns:
a set out of results where each start (non-leaf) vertex, without respect to it`s context, is included just once.

entropyRanking

private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> entropyRanking()

Returns:
the maximum of each information gain raking for each vertex, the same order as vertexSet.

structuralScoring

private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> structuralScoring(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String>> fragments)
Support of vertices in fragments, that occur in failing executions only ( supp(m, sg_f) ).

Parameters:
fragments - as produced by SplitVertices.exec().
Returns:
supp(m, sg_f) for each vertex - same order as vertexSet.

structuralCFRanking

private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> structuralCFRanking(SplitVertices sv)
Calculates the P_fail-corr score.

Parameters:
sv - used to get informations about the fragments
Returns:
the P_fail-corr score for each vertex. Vertices are in same order as vertexSet

combineRankings

public java.util.ArrayList<Scoring.Score> combineRankings(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> structural,
                                                          java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> entropy)
Calculates the normalized average of the passed rankings.

Parameters:
structural - as returned by structuralCFRanking(SplitVertices), or structuralScoring(HashMap)
entropy - as returned by entropyRanking()
Returns:
sorted list

getRanking

public java.util.ArrayList<Scoring.Score> getRanking()
If scores have not been calculated before, exec() is called.

Returns:
scores ordered by Scoring.Score.combinedScore ASC.

toStringEntropyScoresNotNormalized

public java.lang.String toStringEntropyScoresNotNormalized()

getCFRanking

public java.util.ArrayList<Scoring.Score> getCFRanking()

Returns:
a list of vertices ordered by the combination of entropy-scoring and the P_fail-corr score.

getCFRanking

public java.util.ArrayList<Scoring.Score> getCFRanking(Scoring.ScoreComperator sc)

Parameters:
sc - switches the ordering
Returns:
vertices ordered by the passed comparator, ranked by P_fail-corr

getRanking

public java.util.ArrayList<Scoring.Score> getRanking(Scoring.ScoreComperator sc)
If scores have not been calculated before, exec() is called.

Parameters:
sc - switches the ordering
Returns:
scores ordered as specified ASC.

Parameters:

Returns:
